name: Nori (Seaweed)
properties: Low in calories, high in nutrients
benefits: Nori is a nutrient-dense sea vegetable that provides minerals including iodine. It adds umami flavor and nutritional value to plant-based dishes. The natural salt-free form provides minerals without added sodium.
amount: Use as garnish or wrapper, typically 1-2 sheets

quotes: The refreshing Japanese scattered sushi salad known as chirashi-zushi typically calls for raw fish on a bed of rice. This lighter version features vegetables instead of fish, and quinoa replaces the sticky rice. The salad is topped with nori strips as a nod to the sea.
